Package client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides data fields and methods to create a Java data-type, representing a Client connecting a Learning Platform Java application. The overall purpose of this class is to use various GUI components to display various information to the user and use the methods within ClientController to communicate with the server .
    Since:
    March 5, 2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    A.Benaceur, M.Amouzai
